snippet: Disney was constantly reinventing his company, a practice that drove his more business-minded brother crazy but ultimately helped his studio thrive.
abstract: Many may not know that Walt Disney was terrible businessman for much of his career and frequently drove companies into ground; while Disney was in financial straits for much of his career, his aversion to operating business as others generally do led to ultimate and enduring success of Walt Disney Company.
lead_paragraph: Disney was constantly reinventing his company, a practice that drove his more business-minded brother crazy but ultimately helped his studio thrive.

headline.main: Walt Disney, a Visionary Who Was Crazy Like a Mouse
headline.print_headline: A Visionary Who Was Crazy Like a Mouse
